name: Tammy Montgomery
text:
Only good Godfathers Pizza is at the Marathon on Edgewood De in Nicholasville...
Friendliest folks ever a working in there and pizza ready in a zip...
Prices are as great as the pizza and workers, complete satisfaction all the way....

name: Philnita Thomas
text: Humble pie is fantastic! Love it

name: Shannan Williams
text: Absolutely love the pizza, but the lazy employees never answer the phone. Would love if an all new staff was hired and properly trained to do their jobs! The pizza is so good, this company could make a killing! But terrible employees will kill a business quick!

name: Donald Barlow
text: Good pizza but they legit will let the phone ring until you hang up. One day I left it ringing for 20 minutes to see if anyone would answer and they never did. If you want pizza you'll have to go in order and wait for it... ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Chaney
text: Best pizza in Nicholasville fur shur. Never met a rude staff member either! Ronnie and James need a raise!

name: Magg356
text: Great Pizza! Food is great and usually fresh. If not, they fix fresh for you! Staff is friendly and polite. I try to go there often (don't live in the area) lolüòÄ

name: patricia cecil
text: Love their pizza!

name: Jamie West
text: Great pizza and pasta, but you just ae to watch who is cooking and wt time of day you attend.

name: Brandon from Kentucky
text: Surprisingly really good pizza I have it at other gas stations and I prefer Godfathers over Little Cesar's or Papa John's.

name: Bruce Voils
text: Great üçï pizza, friendly service, fun atmosphere

name: Tony Elliott
text: The pepperoni rolls are so delicious and the service is always fast and friendly!!!

name: Amos Critchfield
text: It's really good, I stop in here alot and it's not overly priced and today I actually had a BBQ pulled pork pizza that was delicious. Definitely worth stopping by for

name: Brittany Corman
text: By far my favorite pizza joint

name: Brian Stigler
text: Great Food!!

name: Melissa Mayo
text: Very clean! Frindly service

name: Mack Miracle
text: Great breakfast pizza. Usually made within 10-15 mins.

name: Shawn Siler
text: This is a gas station that serves godfathers pizza.

name: christy harris
text: Best pepperoni rolls in Kentucky!

name: Rebecca Cook
text: Not worth the money.

name: Phil Jones
text: Best Pizza Around!!!
